replies.msg:
Dear all, Freedom isn’t free.

As you have seen recently, how Chinese suppress the freedom of speech of the United States, which proves that once you take the easy money from China, you gonna trade-off the conscience and freedom and, most importantly, your soul. Money can buy anything, but Soul and Conscience can’t.

We are on the frontline of defending freedom and Democracy, and Please JOIN US in fighting this hegemony regime. We need you HELP.

Best wishes,
A unknown HongKonger
